summary:
This follower mod is standalone.You don't need other mods.
Horora can be found at the Jorrvaskr in Whiterun.

AI type as AelaTheHunter
Level 28~78
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5][center][/center][/size][/b][b][size=5][center][/center][/size][/b][b][size=5][center]Standalone Follower- Horora[/center][/size][/b][center][img]https://t.williamgates.net/image-CFBF_54606C5D.jpg[/img][/center]

This follower mod is standalone.You don't need other mods.
Horora can be found at the Jorrvaskr in Whiterun.
[center][color=#ffff00][size=5]
[youtube]MXLq3qzo8P0[/youtube]
[Character][/size][/color]
[size=3][color=#ffff00]Name [/color]: Horora
[color=#ffff00]Body[/color] : UNPB
[color=#ffff00]Place : [/color]Whiterun Jorrvaskr
[color=#ffff00]AI :[/color] as AelaTheHunter
[color=#ffff00]Level [/color]:28~78(Level up with player)
[color=#ffff00]Race [/color]: Descendant of former Akavir royalty
[color=#ffff00]Aromr: [/color]Companoins Aromr
[color=#ffff00]Weapon:[/color]Traditional Chinese Swords
[/size][/center]
[center][b][size=5][color=#00ff00]Story[/color]
[/size][/b]
[size=3][b]Horora [/b] is a descendant of former Akavir royalty. Her clan had arrived in Skyrim by sea and settled on this frozen land. For many generations they have lived in seclusion, but as the eldest daughter,[b]Horora [/b] grew restless of the peaceful life and decided to take up the sword to seek adventure in Whiterun. [/size][/center][center]
